title: Sometimes when I try to pay with GooglePay and NFC, NFC doesnt work, but reboot fix it for some time
content:
How it looks like: I put my phone to terminal and no reaction from shop terminal or phone.
When I rebooted my phone, NFC fixed and I can pay as normal.
But If I will pay next day, I'm not sure that I don't need to reboot my phone standing at the checkout in the store.
I met similar problem on my Pixel 2 phone, but I thought it's my personal device problem(hardware maybe), but now with Pixel 3a I understand that it looks like software issue.
